document_data.name: Bosco Daggerhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Bosco Daggerhand''' was the proprietor of the tavern [[Bosco's Bilge]] in [[Jahaka Anchorage]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: True to his name, Bosco never made an introduction without keeping his free hand upon the [[dagger]] that hung from his hip.
document_data.Relationships: Bosco was protected by a partially-domesticated [[deinonychus]] called [[Knuckles]]. Their relationship was made possible by Bosco's ''[[ring of animal influence]]''.
